${ModID}:GreyBargain.NAME: Grey Bargain
${ModID}:GreyBargain.DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your draw pile by Exhausting a card in your hand.
${ModID}:GreyBargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a ${ModID}:Buried card to your draw pile by Exhausting a card in your hand. NL Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need a card to Exhaust.
